UNLOCKGAME.INSTRUCTIONS1: Click on a game to add it.
UNLOCKGAME.EXISTS: Game already added to unlock list.

LIST.NODOMAIN: Please select the domain(s) to get started!
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Start by selecting the domain(s) you would like to see then clicking the display button.

LOCKED.NAME: Locked
LOCKED.DESCRIPTION: Locked games will only be available under certain conditions. E.g. As prize for a bonus.

LOCKMSG.NAME: Lock Message
LOCKMSG.DESCRIPTION: This is the message that would be displayed to a player for which the game is locked.
LOCKMSG.PLACEHOLDER: E.g. : This game is locked, to unlock deposit $100 with bonus code x

GAME.DOMAINSELECTED: The information displayed below is for the chosen domain. Please remember to save the information if you've made any changes.'
GAME.UNSAVED: Changes made to game information, please remember to click the save button, to save your changes.
GAME.PLAYERS: Players Who Have Unlocked this Game

EDIT.DESCRIPTION: The information displayed is configurable per domain, please make sure you choose the correct domain before editing.

UNLOCK.SEARCH: Search for the player that you would like to unlock for this game.
UNLOCK.DOMAINSELECT: Select the domain for the player, then search below for the player name
UNLOCK.DOMAINSELECTED: Chosen domain for the player search:
UNLOCK.USERREGERROR: Could not unlock game for selected player, please try again later.
